attributes.action: Re-do the House of Commons to the same standard as the House of Lords
attributes.background: The House of Commons is where all the power is and also where the hard work is done but yet in comparison to the House of Lords it looks like a dingy hotel lobby rather than the most important room in the country. It is 2018 and all pointless tradition should be thrown to the wind.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by "the same standard". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
